section.section: The Board shall report to the Commissioner on or before June 1 of each year.

At a minimum, the report shall include:
a description of the operations of the Pool for the preceding calendar year;
an audited statement of the financial condition of the Pool as of the preceding December 31; and
an audited detailed statement of the revenues received and expenditures of the Pool made during the preceding calendar year.

text.section: The operations of the Board are subject to an annual audit by an independent auditor, and the audit report and working papers are subject to review by the Legislative Auditor.
